text: Carlos Revilla González (22 January 1933 – 28 September 2000) was a Spanish voice actor. He was known for performing the Spanish voice of Homer Simpson in the first eleven seasons of The Simpsons and KITT in Knight Rider. He also dubbed actors such as Walter Matthau, Bill Cosby and Jack Lemmon. Revilla died in Madrid of a heart attack on 28 September 2000, aged 67. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1933 births Category:2000 deaths Category:Spanish voice actors Category:People from Salamanca Category:Disease- related deaths in Madrid Category:Deaths from myocardial infarction
title: Carlos Revilla
